001package io.jstach.rainbowgum;
002
003import java.net.URI;
004import java.util.ArrayList;
005import java.util.EnumSet;
006import java.util.List;
007import java.util.Map;
008import java.util.Optional;
009import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
010
011import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperty.Property;
012import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogPublisher.PublisherFactory;
013import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogPublisher.PublisherProvider;
014import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogResponse.Status;
015import io.jstach.rainbowgum.publisher.BlockingQueueAsyncLogPublisher;
016import io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi.RainbowGumServiceProvider;
017
018/**
019 * Registry of publishers. Rainbow Gum registers default publishers with the following
020 * schemes:
021 * <ul>
022 * <li>{@value #SYNC_SCHEME} - default sync publisher</li>
023 * <li>{@value #ASYNC_SCHEME} - default async publisher</li>
024 * <li>{@value #DEFAULT_SCHEME} - by default this is the same as
025 * {@link #SYNC_SCHEME}.</li>
026 * </ul>
027 * Plugins may override the above so that the above is automatically replaced with other
028 * providers via the service loader.
029 *
030 * @see RainbowGumServiceProvider
031 */
032public sealed interface LogPublisherRegistry extends LogPublisher.PublisherProvider {
033
034        /**
035         * Register a publisher provider by URI scheme.
036         * @param scheme uri scheme.
037         * @param publisherProvider provider.
038         */
039        public void register(String scheme, LogPublisher.PublisherProvider publisherProvider);
040
041        /**
042         * Will retrieve the status of all publishers usually for health checking.
043         * @return list of status of publishers.
044         */
045        public List<LogResponse> status();
046
047        /**
048         * This is URI scheme for the async publisher used by the publisher builder. Call
049         * {@link #register(String, io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogPublisher.PublisherProvider)} with
050         * this scheme to replace the default async publisher.
051         */
052        public static String ASYNC_SCHEME = "async";
053
054        /**
055         * This is the URI scheme for the sync publisher builder to find a sync publisher.
056         * Call {@link #register(String, io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogPublisher.PublisherProvider)}
057         * with this scheme to replace the default sync publisher.
058         */
059        public static String SYNC_SCHEME = "sync";
060
061        /**
062         * This is the URI scheme for the default publisher.
063         * {@link #register(String, io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogPublisher.PublisherProvider)} with
064         * this scheme to replace the default publisher.
065         */
066        public static String DEFAULT_SCHEME = "default";
067
068        /**
069         * Because publisher configurators through service provider discovery can replace the
070         * default schemes of {@link #ASYNC_SCHEME}, {@link #SYNC_SCHEME} all the builtin core
071         * providers are prefixed with this value so that they can still be used even if
072         * overriden.
073         */
074        public static String BUILTIN_SCHEME_PREFIX = "core.";
075
076        /**
077         * Default async buffer size.
078         */
079        public static final int ASYNC_BUFFER_SIZE = 1024;
080
081        /**
082         * Buffer Size property name.
083         */
084        public static final String BUFFER_SIZE_NAME = "bufferSize";
085
086        /**
087         * Buffer Size Property for Async publishers.
088         */
089        public static final String BUFFER_SIZE_PROPERTY = LogProperties.PUBLISHER_PREFIX + BUFFER_SIZE_NAME;
090
091}
092
093final class DefaultPublisherRegistry implements LogPublisherRegistry {
094
095        private final ServiceRegistry serviceRegistry;
096
097        private final ConcurrentHashMap<String, PublisherProvider> providers = new ConcurrentHashMap<String, LogPublisher.PublisherProvider>();
098
099        public DefaultPublisherRegistry(ServiceRegistry serviceRegistry) {
100                super();
101                this.serviceRegistry = serviceRegistry;
102        }
103
104        @Override
105        public PublisherFactory provide(LogProviderRef ref) {
106                ref = DefaultLogProviderRef.normalize(ref);
107                var uri = ref.uri();
108                String scheme = uri.getScheme();
109                if (scheme == null) {
110                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("URI is missing scheme. uri: " + uri);
111                }
112                var provider = Optional.ofNullable(providers.get(scheme)).orElseThrow();
113                return provider.provide(ref);
114        }
115
116        @Override
117        public void register(String scheme, LogPublisher.PublisherProvider publisherProvider) {
118                providers.put(scheme, publisherProvider);
119        }
120
121        /**
122         * Creates a publisher registry instance.
123         * @return publisher registry.
124         */
125        static LogPublisherRegistry of(ServiceRegistry serviceRegistry) {
126                var r = new DefaultPublisherRegistry(serviceRegistry);
127                for (var p : DefaultPublisherProviders.values()) {
128                        r.register(p.scheme(), p);
129                        r.register(BUILTIN_SCHEME_PREFIX + p.scheme(), p);
130                }
131                return r;
132        }
133
134        @Override
135        public List<LogResponse> status() {
136                List<LogResponse> responses = new ArrayList<>();
137                serviceRegistry.forEach(LogPublisher.class, (name, pub) -> {
138                        Status status;
139                        try {
140                                status = pub.status();
141                        }
142                        catch (Exception e) {
143                                status = LogResponse.Status.ofError(e);
144                        }
145                        responses.add(new Response(LogPublisher.class, name, status));
146                });
147                return responses;
148        }
149
150}
151
152enum DefaultPublisherProviders implements LogPublisher.PublisherProvider {
153
154        DEFAULT {
155                @Override
156                public String scheme() {
157                        return LogPublisherRegistry.DEFAULT_SCHEME;
158                }
159
160                @Override
161                protected PublisherFactory provide(String name, LogProperties properties) {
162                        return (n, config, appenders) -> new DefaultSyncLogPublisher(appenders.asSingle());
163                }
164        },
165        SYNC {
166                @Override
167                public String scheme() {
168                        return LogPublisherRegistry.SYNC_SCHEME;
169                }
170
171                @Override
172                protected PublisherFactory provide(String name, LogProperties properties) {
173                        return (n, config, appenders) -> new DefaultSyncLogPublisher(appenders.asSingle());
174                }
175
176        },
177        ASYNC {
178
179                @Override
180                public String scheme() {
181                        return LogPublisherRegistry.ASYNC_SCHEME;
182                }
183
184                @Override
185                protected PublisherFactory provide(String name, LogProperties properties) {
186                        int _bufferSize = Property.builder()
187                                .ofInt() //
188                                .buildWithName(LogPublisherRegistry.BUFFER_SIZE_PROPERTY, name) //
189                                .get(properties) //
190                                .value(LogPublisherRegistry.ASYNC_BUFFER_SIZE);
191                        return (n, config, appenders) -> BlockingQueueAsyncLogPublisher
192                                .of(appenders.flags(EnumSet.of(LogAppender.AppenderFlag.REUSE_BUFFER)).asSingle(), _bufferSize);
193                }
194        };
195
196        @Override
197        public PublisherFactory provide(LogProviderRef ref) {
198                return (n, config, appenders) -> provide(ref.uri(), n, config.properties()).create(n, config, appenders);
199        }
200
201        public abstract String scheme();
202
203        protected abstract PublisherFactory provide(String name, LogProperties properties);
204
205        public PublisherFactory provide(URI uri, String name, LogProperties properties) {
206                String prefix = LogProperties.interpolateKey(LogProperties.PUBLISHER_PREFIX, Map.of(LogProperties.NAME, name));
207                LogProperties combined = LogProperties.of(uri, prefix, properties);
208                return provide(name, combined);
209        }
210
211}
